author: Jon Stone, Jon Stone
title: EU agrees to open accession talks with Albania and North Macedonia
description: Member state ministers unblock way for Western Balkans to join bloc
content:
The EU has agreed to open accession talks with two countries with a view to them joining the bloc.
Ministers from member states gave the green light to negotiations with Albania and North Macedonia on Tuesday.
The two countries have been candidates since 20… [+26339 chars]
